item.title: Brief Foreword
item.description: Rambling Ahead My guilty pleasure is hunting Novel Updates for a good time . I’m a pretty heavy reader of the transmigration and isekai genres, and while there are things I enjoy about them, there are also things that I find quite annoying about them.

item.title: C-Novel, LightNovel, and K-Novel Recommendations
item.description: Though trying to find a good book in the sea of Novel Updates is often like wading through a sea of trash, there are many shining gems in the genre if one would care to look.

item.title: Chapter 01-Cen Wei the Suspicious
item.description: What are you doing? Jiaojiao ignored the ball of light in favor of peeking through one of the many holes in the front window.

item.title: Chapter 01-Death of an Influencer
item.description: Jiaojiao, beauty blogger, skincare guru, and spokesperson for MEI cosmetics, was dead at the age of 23. The internet celebrity was trending moments after her scheduled Friday stream ended disastrously, having collapsed on camera to the bemused gazes of her supposed fans, just moments from applying the last rhinestone to her bedazzled pinky nail.

item.title: Chapter 02-The Missing Heroine
item.description: There was a heavy silence the moment Jiaojiao spoke to the empty room. Oppressive and somehow, sullen. How did you know?

item.title: Chapter 03-The Cold Prince Loves Me Dearly
item.description: “The Cold Prince Loves me Dearly?” Jiaojiao could barely get the words out through her upset. “You brought me here for this?

item.title: Unnamed Book-Blurb
item.description: Bai Jing, assassin of 21st earth, terror of the criminal underworld, reaper of wicked and innocent alike, was dead– murdered by her own lover for her mother’s inheritance.

item.title: ðŸŒ± NaNoWriMo-April 2022
item.description: I’ve had this idea for a book series bouncing around for quite some time and NaNoWriMo was just the excuse that I needed to jumpstart the whole endeavor.
